OUTLINE : This dose escalation study . Patients receive 3-aminopyridine-2-carboxaldehyde thiosemicarbazone ( 3-AP ) IV 2 hour day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 1-6 patient receive escalate dos 3-AP maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine .
